resources.string:
If you are female, you must:
 Be healthy and feeling well
Be at least 17 years old in most states
Be at least 5 ft 5 inch
Weigh at least 150 lbs.

If you are male, you must:
Be healthy and feeling well
Be at least 17 years old in most states
Be at least 5 ft 1 inch 
Weigh at least 130 lbs.

Giving blood saves lives. The blood you give is a lifeline in an emergency and for people who need long-term treatments. Many people would not be alive today if donors had not generously given their blood.

This is a demo projects on blood donation and collecting. Our Team Members are: 
 1. Komal Bhat
 2. Sarvesh Koli 
 3. Prerna Kokate 
 4. Siddhant kolhe 
 5. Bhagwat Kolekar
